csdl.jupiter
Class ReviewPlugin

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.core.runtime.Plugin
      org.eclipse.ui.plugin.AbstractUIPlugin
          csdl.jupiter.ReviewPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.ui.IStartup, org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator
public class ReviewPlugin
extends org.eclipse.ui.plugin.AbstractUIPlugin
implements org.eclipse.ui.IStartup

Provides one time Code ReviewIssue plug-in instantiation (singleton). Contains the ReviewIssueModel model instance.

Version:
$Id: ReviewPlugin.java,v 1.21 2005/05/06 05:22:47 takuyay Exp $
Author:
Takuya Yamashita

initializeDefaultPreferences

protected void initializeDefaultPreferences(org.eclipse.jface.preference.IPreferenceStore store)
Initializes a preference store with default preference values for this plug-in. This method could be overridden due to AbstractUIPlugin abstract class. It's because it is empty protected method in the AbstractUIPlugin.

Overrides:
initializeDefaultPreferences in class org.eclipse.ui.plugin.AbstractUIPlugin
Parameters:
store - the preference store to fill

notifyListeners

public void notifyListeners(int type,
                            int kind)
Notifies the listeners who implement the IReviewListener. This method can be invoked anytime, but it is designed for the function to let listeners to know the review event is invoked.

Parameters:
type - the type of the review event.
kind - the kind of the type.
